name: Personal projects from Péter Trombitás
body:
# WebGL
Some WebGL projects I created at university.
Please be noted: they make heavy use of the GPU. They're not optimized for mobile. You have been warned :)

### [Ray-casting brain visualization](webgl-ray-casting/brain.html) 
### [Path tracer](webgl-path-tracing/trace.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
